sourcesContent:
export default function InputSection(bookTitle: string, doKMeans: Function, handleSubmit: Function, setBookTitle: Function, setDescription: Function) { function handleFormSubmission() { } return (

Book Recommender!

Insert the title of a book you like and/or a description of what you want to see.

Wait and see the recommendations from it!

{bookTitle}

Input Your Information Below

) }
